title: How to Make a Blueberry Muffin Smoothie

steps.headline: Wash the spinach.
steps.description: Place the spinach into a bowl filled with lukewarm water and scrub the spinach with your hands.

steps.headline: Prepare the ingredients.
steps.description: Have the blueberries, almond milk, oats, hemp seeds, ground flax seed, maple syrup, cinnamon, vanilla extract, and spinach in your workplace to make the process easier.

steps.headline: Put the ingredients into a blender.
steps.description: In a good-quality blender, add all the ingredients.

steps.headline: Blend the smoothie on high for one minute.
steps.description: Make sure the smoothie is lump free and smooth.

steps.headline: Pour the smoothie into a glass.
steps.description: Transfer the freshly made smoothie into a clean drinking glass.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Add a straw and place some blueberries and oats on top of the smoothie for decoration.

text: Wash the spinach. Place the spinach into a bowl filled with lukewarm water and scrub the spinach with your hands. Prepare the ingredients. Have the blueberries, almond milk, oats, hemp seeds, ground flax seed, maple syrup, cinnamon, vanilla extract, and spinach in your workplace to make the process easier. Put the ingredients into a blender. In a good-quality blender, add all the ingredients. Blend the smoothie on high for one minute. Make sure the smoothie is lump free and smooth. Pour the smoothie into a glass. Transfer the freshly made smoothie into a clean drinking glass. Serve. Add a straw and place some blueberries and oats on top of the smoothie for decoration.
